action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To delay for 1 year the application of Revenue Ruling 2012–18 with respect to the characterization of payments as tips or service charges.

section.header: Delay in application of Revenue Ruling 2012–18 with respect to characterization of tips or service charges
section.text: The Secretary of the Treasury shall not apply Revenue Ruling 2012–18 (or any other similar guidance) for purposes of determining whether any payment made before January 1, 2015, is a tip as opposed to a service charge.
